comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in seal script with annotations, arranged vertically in columns. The text includes both ancient script forms and explanatory notes (e.g., '切', '聲', '从糸') typical of a dictionary or lexicographical work like the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The right margin contains page numbers and section identifiers ('小三九十五', '言文一三一', '吳喜').
